name: R3-device-status-for-R2
title: Cross-version VS for R3.FHIRDeviceStatus for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-status|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R2. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R3 to R2.
